name: clammily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is unpleasantly sticky and slightly wet : He sprang to his feet, and shook Harry clammily by the hand. The morning was grey, dank, and clammily cold, as it had been for a couple of days.
More examplesFewer examplesA lock of hair was stuck clammily to his forehead above his glasses.Sweat made his clothes stick clammily to his weary body.
